official_title: To designate April 28, 1989, as "National Day of Remembrance of the 749 American Victims of Operation Tiger".

summary.text: Designates April 28, 1989, as National Day of Remembrance of the 749 American Victims of Operation Tiger. (Operation Tiger was the code name for the rehearsal of the D-Day invasion in World War II.)

titles.title: To designate April 28, 1989, as "National Day of Remembrance of the 749 American Victims of Operation Tiger".
